name: Heinrich Cornelius Agrippa
description: Author of De occulta philosophia, interested in the theory and practice of alchemy.
quote: The study of Agrippa's works confirms his constant interest in the theory and practice of alchemy.

name: Masha'allah ibn Athari
description: 8th-century astrologer and astronomer, associated with De elementis and Liber de Orbe.
quote: The same observation applies to two further fundamental treatises, Avicebron's Fons vitae and Domenico Gundisalvi's De processione mundi (ca. 1160).

name: Avicebron (Solomon ibn Gabirol)
description: Author of Fons vitae, central to 12th-century cosmography.
